mutations.name: Ripe
mutations.visual_description: Magenta in color
mutations.obtainment: This mutation can only be added to Sugar Apple.

mutations.name: Gold
mutations.visual_description: Shining, Golden in color, Will emit a shimmering sound
mutations.obtainment: 1% chance to grow replacing the normal variant. Can be applied by the Dragonfly pet.

mutations.name: Rainbow
mutations.visual_description: Continuously changes color, Emits yellow particles and a rainbow above it
mutations.obtainment: 0.1% chance to grow replacing the normal variant. Can be applied by the Butterfly pet when a crop has 5+ mutations, and all previous mutations will be removed.

mutations.name: Wet
mutations.visual_description: Dripping with water particles.
mutations.obtainment: During Rain. During Thunderstorm. Small chance from sprinklers. Can be applied by Sea Turtle. During admin event Under The Sea.

mutations.name: Windstruck
mutations.visual_description: Has wind gusts swoop around the crop
mutations.obtainment: During Windy. During Gale.

mutations.name: Moonlit
mutations.visual_description: Glowing, purple aroma, Purple in color
mutations.obtainment: During Night, with a max of 6 plants being moonlit every 2 minutes during the duration of the Night.

mutations.name: Clay
mutations.visual_description: Appears a brown-ish color and has a unique texture
mutations.obtainment: By combining the 'Wet' mutation and 'Sandy' mutation.

mutations.name: Chilled
mutations.visual_description: Slightly bluish in color, Emits frost particles
mutations.obtainment: During Frost. Can be applied by the Polar Bear. Can be applied by using a Mutation Spray Chilled on a crop.

mutations.name: Choc
mutations.visual_description: Brown in color, Dripping with chocolate syrup
mutations.obtainment: From a Chocolate Sprinkler. During Chocolate Rain. Using a Mutation Choc Spray on a crop.

mutations.name: Sandy
mutations.visual_description: Tan color, Emits puffs of sand around the fruit
mutations.obtainment: During Sandstorm

mutations.name: Bloodlit
mutations.visual_description: Shining, Red in color
mutations.obtainment: During Blood Moon, which has a chance to replace Night every 4 hours.

mutations.name: Twisted
mutations.visual_description: Has Tornado-like swirls coming out of it, similar to the Windstuck Mutation.
mutations.obtainment: During Tornado.

mutations.name: Drenched
mutations.visual_description: Large water droplets fall from the crop, Crop is slightly saturated
mutations.obtainment: Given to crops during Tropical Rain. Replaces Wet Mutation

mutations.name: Cloudtouched
mutations.visual_description: Emits flashing, red glints, Cloud-like aura all around.
mutations.obtainment: Can be applied by the Mutation Spray Cloudtouched. Small chance to be applied by the Hyacinth Macaw pet.

mutations.name: Frozen
mutations.visual_description: Encased in an ice block.
mutations.obtainment: If a crop has both Wet/Drenched and Chilled mutations. Can be applied by Polar Bear. Can be applied by the Flower Froster Sprinkler (only applies to flower type plants)

mutations.name: Aurora
mutations.visual_description: Pulses between blues and purples, Releases a faint smoke from above the crop
mutations.obtainment: Given during Aurora Borealis.

mutations.name: Shocked
mutations.visual_description: Has a neon glow
mutations.obtainment: When a crop is struck during a Thunderstorm or a Jandel Storm. Using a Mutation Spray Shocked on a crop.

mutations.name: Celestial
mutations.visual_description: Slightly reflectant, Sparkling yellow and purple
mutations.obtainment: When a crop is struck during Meteor Shower.

mutations.name: Pollinated
mutations.visual_description: Shining, Yellow in color, Emits yellow gas-like particles.
mutations.obtainment: During a Bee Swarm or Worker Bee Swarm. Can be applied by certain bee pets. Using a Mutation Spray Pollinated on a crop.

mutations.name: Burnt
mutations.visual_description: Unharvested: Black in color, Sparking. Harvested: Black in color, Emits ash particles
mutations.obtainment: Can be applied by the Cooked Owl pet. Can be applied by the Mutation Spray Burnt.

mutations.name: Verdant
mutations.visual_description: Green in color, Emits green rectangular particles
mutations.obtainment: Small chance to be applied by the Scarlet Macaw pet or the Solar Flare admin weather.

mutations.name: Wiltproof
mutations.visual_description: Unknown(Drought weather is unreleased)
mutations.obtainment: Obtainable in the Drought Weather

mutations.name: Plasma
mutations.visual_description: Neon, Pinkish purple in color
mutations.obtainment: During a Laser Storm.

mutations.name: HoneyGlazed
mutations.visual_description: Emits a yellow fog, Dripping in honey
mutations.obtainment: From a Honey Sprinkler. Can be applied by the Bear Bee pet.

mutations.name: Heavenly
mutations.visual_description: Emits golden, shining stars from the base
mutations.obtainment: During a Floating Jandel event. (Can only be spawned by admins)

mutations.name: Fried
mutations.visual_description: Small yellow particles fall from the crop
mutations.obtainment: During a Fried Chicken event.

mutations.name: Amber
mutations.visual_description: Coated in semi-transparent orange overlay, emits orange cloud particles
mutations.obtainment: Using Amber Mutation Spray. Small chance to be applied by the Raptor pet when a fruit is harvested.

mutations.name: Cooked
mutations.visual_description: Orange in color, Emits white steam and red swirls
mutations.obtainment: Small chance to be applied by the Cooked Owl pet.

mutations.name: OldAmber
mutations.visual_description: More orange than its yellow predecessor
mutations.obtainment: After 24 hours, the Amber mutation will age into OldAmber

mutations.name: Zombified
mutations.visual_description: Emits a green fog, Dripping with green liquid
mutations.obtainment: Can be applied by the Chicken Zombie pet.

mutations.name: Molten
mutations.visual_description: Neon, Orange, yellow and red in color
mutations.obtainment: During a Volcano event.

mutations.name: Ceramic
mutations.visual_description: Looks darker in color similar to sundried. Fruits with the Ceramic mutation cannot have Burnt.
mutations.obtainment: Requires the Clay mutation and one of: Burnt, Fried, Cooked, Molten, Sundried, Meteoric or Plasma

mutations.name: AncientAmber
mutations.visual_description: Unknown
mutations.obtainment: After an unknown amount of time, OldAmber will age into AncientAmber

mutations.name: Sundried
mutations.visual_description: Dark brown tint applied
mutations.obtainment: During a Heatwave or Solar Flare event. Can redirect with a Tanning Mirror.

mutations.name: Paradisal
mutations.visual_description: Lime Green in color, Emits sun ray-like particles.
mutations.obtainment: Occurs when a plant is both Verdant and Sundried, replaces both mutations.

mutations.name: Alienlike
mutations.visual_description: Cyan in color, Cyan particles emitted from the fruit, Parts of fruit can be fully transparent/invisible, or be partially transparent.
mutations.obtainment: During the Alien Invasion Event

mutations.name: Galactic
mutations.visual_description: Light purple or pink in color, Some areas are neon, Glimmers out pink sparkles
mutations.obtainment: During the Space Travel Event

mutations.name: Disco
mutations.visual_description: Shining, Flashing red, pink, yellow, green, and blue (in that order) constantly
mutations.obtainment: During a Disco event. (Can only be spawned by admins) Can be applied by the Disco Bee pet.

mutations.name: Meteoric
mutations.visual_description: Having golden-yellow particles around the crop.
mutations.obtainment: During a Meteor event. (Can only be spawned by admins)

mutations.name: Voidtouched
mutations.visual_description: Emits black hole particles
mutations.obtainment: During a Black Hole event. (Can only be spawned by admins)

mutations.name: Dawnbound
mutations.visual_description: Glows a pure white
mutations.obtainment: During the Sun God Event, by getting 4 players holding 4 Sunflowers with each flower touching in front of the Sun God. This mutation can only be applied to Sunflowers.

mutation_rules.formula: Total Price = Base Value × (1 + ∑Mutations - Number of Mutations) × Growth Mutation × (Weight/Base Weight)²
exclusivity_rules: Only one of either Golden or Rainbow can be applied.
Only one of either Chilled, Wet, Drenched, or Frozen can be applied.
Only one of either Burnt or Cooked can be applied.
Only one of either Verdant, Sundried or Paradisal can be applied.
Only one of either Sandy, Clay, Wet or Drenched can be applied.
Only one of either Ceramic, Burnt, Fried, Cooked, Molten or Clay can be applied.
AncientAmber replaces OldAmber which replaces Amber

pet_mutations.pet: Bee, Honey Bee, Petal Bee, Queen Bee
